/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban architecture. Cars and buses can be seen moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
